name: Quagmagogl Goes to Hell
description:
Quagmagogl, the CEO of something or other, commits murder and then suicide so that he can go to Hell, kill Satan and lord over his new dominion. On the way he makes some pretty chill friends and learns the true meaning of friendship and love- Murder.

"It's very terrible absolutely do not play" - SusBoi

"OMG SUCH CHILL" - Me

"DONATE £9999999999.99 BRO, ITS WORTH IT" - Me with a moustache
